info.author: Chris Mutel
info.description:
Brightway
=========

Brightway is a web-based life cycle assessment (LCA) toolkit. It provides 
advanced capabilities, such as parameterization and regionalization. As 
Brightway is being actively developed, it is not considered stable for 
production use. If you have comments or questions, please contact Chris Mutel 
at cmutel@gmail.com.
